Hello, 
     I just read this post, it came out before I arrived back on th=
e scene, but I have been sporatically reading some of the posts I have miss=
ed. 

My core characters would be: Cyclonus & Scourge, Marauder, Legacy. I =
am also keeping Rodimus for the moment to work out a few things with Airly.=


I am also utilizing other characters that I was temping before I left suc=
h as: Lord Elder, and Zarak/Skorponok to keep some plot elements running, b=
ut they may fade back into the backround as things quiet a little. And of c=
ourse there were the minions I left in NPC status and Myrmidon who is in th=
e background. 

You will probrably note that as time goes along some of the=
se other characters I play will fade into and out of the backround, and I w=
ill only be playing a few at a time as people need RP partners or events un=
fold. For example, Legacy tends to stay at the Ark for the most part, and w=
ill eventually return there unless something happens to change that.

If an=
yone wants to run one of the minions NPC's or any of the characters I am te=
mping, they are more than welcome, so long as they let me know first :)

An=
d for the record, I am all for consolidation of the factions for the moment=
. Perhaps Hydras could have userped control of the Bushido Predacons and su=
ch, and others, while the other Maximal clans come together under one banne=
r?? Food for thought! :)

Anyways, game on!

Preston

 

--- In nbwrpg@yaho=
ogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:
>
> I started working on updati=
ng the web site tonight.  We have a lot of
> characters that have gone inac=
tive.  I know that usually when someone is not
> active in the group, other=
 players pick up those characters.  I've been
> reading through some of our=
 posts over the last two years and I'm noticing
> that we're getting really=
 confused with all these locations and characters.
> I know I have some cor=
e characters that I really enjoy posting for, then I
> have some less impor=
tant characters that I keep posting out of obligation;
> I'm noticing other=
 people do this too.
> 
> What I think we should do is each come up with a =
list of the characters we
> want to post for, and put aside some of the mor=
e minor characters until the
> group gets more active and we can manage mul=
tiple storylines.  The inactive
> characters can remain in the background a=
nd we can always bring them back
> when we want to.  Additionally, we have =
some major characters like Hydras
> and the Faction leaders that I think pe=
ople do need to post for.
> *(Magicquartz,
> don't worry about this since y=
ou're just getting started)*
> 
> Take a look at this list and see if I'm m=
issing anyone, if you have time
> please update your characters:
> http://w=
ww.wikihost.org/w/nbwrpg_wiki/character_list/  (I'm only halfway
> through =
my updates as of this email)
> 
> Action plan:
> 
>    - Lord Perseus (Pasi=
ficus Maximals) and Lord Razorwing (Silver Wings
>    Maximals) should cons=
olidate into one Maximal group and either choose one
>    leader, or have c=
o-leaders and let the two factions operate separately but
>    in a more co=
operative fashion.  I'm going to have Perseus give a call for
>    all maxi=
mals to get on the shuttle.
>    - Iron Skull Predacons with Jotuun have no=
t been really active and there
>    really aren't very many members.  We sh=
ould just leave them as they are and
>    not worry about them for now.
>  =
  - Bushido Predacons have been inactive for a while, however I started a
>=
    thread with Celeron a few months ago.  I plan to continue that and have=
 him
>    investigate the cause of the Tidal Wave which wrecked Atlantis.  =
We can
>    probably also leave the rest of the faction inactive for now.
>=
    - The Watchers, I'm not sure what's going on with this group, members a=
re
>    Lord Elder, Deadfur, ?
>    - Minions - Since Preston left, nothing=
 has happened with the Minions.  I
>    can take over his main minion chara=
cters and get the action started again.
>    Preston noted that the more he=
 acted as a GM and posted for the minions, the
>    more active the group g=
ot.  I think we just need a little excitement!
>    - Dark Rodimus and Nigh=
tlight.  I'm trying to find out more information
>    about the status of t=
hese two characters.  Would Hydras be more inclined to
>    let Nightlight =
go home now that there's a truce?  This might make a good
>    thread, gett=
ing back these two characters from Hydras.
> 
> Questions!?!  Ideas?
> 
> -=
Krafltos
